scenes.background: Monica and Bob are both looking at you expectantly after your discussion.
scenes.description: So, whats the plan now with this task?

options.text: Let's all sit down and figure out how to tackle this efficiently.
options.analysis: You suggested a collaborative approach, showing strong perception and empathy, but self-regulation could be improved.

options.text: I think we should break it down and assign parts based on our strengths.
options.analysis: You proposed a structured plan, showcasing good self-regulation and social skills, but motivation was lower.

options.text: Maybe we should consider bringing in another team member to help.
options.analysis: You suggested getting additional help, displaying motivation and social skills, but lacked in perception and empathy.
